text: The Hopps Open de Provence is a golf tournament on the Challenge Tour. It was first played in September 2018 at Golf International de Pont Royal in Mallemort, Bouches-du-Rhône, France. The main sponsor of the tournament is Hopps Group, a French holding company managing six subsidiaries in the field of logistics, postal parcels and door-to-door sales. ==Winners== {|class=wikitable style="font-size:95%" !Year!!Winner!!Country!!Score!!To par!!Margin of victory!!Runner(s)-up |- | 2019 || Lars van Meijel || || align=center|272 || align=center|−16 || 1 stroke || Sebastian Heisele |- | 2018 || Romain Langasque || || align=center|273 || align=center|−15 || 3 strokes || Joel Girrbach Joel Sjöholm |} ==References== ==External links== * *Coverage on the Challenge Tour's official site Category:Challenge Tour events Category:Golf tournaments in France Category:2018 establishments in France Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2018
title: Open de Provence
